divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the big dipper, and was following,(from what i've heard) the line that the handle points to. As I was doing this I observed, just after sirious(?), a star appeared in the void that is following the constellation, shown like a star, then doubled in size and disappeared. The only thing I could think of is that I saw a supernova. Then I asked myself; with the naked eye? I know I'm not the only one who saw this. I know what I saw, and if anyone wants to talk to me about it would be much appreciated.
Summary: star, doubled in size, then disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Independence
This sighting has never been favorited.
